page.title: 13OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Mr Westlake is an animal feed specialist.He works 8 hours a day and travels by car.The time that he starts varies each day.His work is carried out on farms.It is hard work, but he enjoys it. Mr Gist works as a log seller in the winter and on Stowe Barton farm in the summer.For twelve years he was a shepherd. The hardest part of his job is chopping the logs.He is self-employed. Mrs Harris is a girl groom and works from home.Part of her job is mucking out and exercising the horses.She epecially likes taking the horses out hunting.She works 8 hours a day, including week-ends and also rides for the Tetcott Hunt which meets on Saturdays and Tuesdays
